snippet.title: BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY VGA 2010 Trailer - Hugo Strange Reveal!
snippet.description:
CGR Trailers presents the BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY Video Game Awards (VGA) trailer. This brand new trailer features one Batman's oldest supervillains, Dr. Hugo Strange!!!

Check out more video game trailers from Classic Game Room's CGRtrailers at http://www.youtube.com/CGRtrailers

Get more Classic Game Room on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/ClassicGameRoom
